function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential contamination of wastewater collection samples with SARS-CoV-2 virus","Impact":"Misleading or inaccurate estimation of disease prevalence, leading to ineffective public health measures","Mitigation":"Strict biosafety protocols, regular testing and validation of pasteurization methods","Technologies":"Biosafety cabinets, UV light, pasteurization equipment","People":"Researchers, public health officials, wastewater treatment facility staff","Owner":"Researchers, wastewater treatment facility staff"},{"Description":"Potential spread of the virus during sample collection and handling","Impact":"Risk of infection for individuals involved in sample collection and handling","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE), adherence to strict hygiene protocols","Technologies":"PPE, hand sanitizer, disinfection equipment","People":"Researchers, wastewater treatment facility staff","Owner":"Researchers, wastewater treatment facility staff"},{"Description":"Potential misinterpretation of wastewater data leading to premature public health actions","Impact":"Unnecessary panic or implementation of ineffective public health measures","Mitigation":"Thorough data analysis and validation, collaboration with public health officials","Technologies":"Data analysis software, collaboration platforms","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers"}]}
